mapper.insert: INSERT into apply_dogiver(dog_id, dog_name, dog_age, dog_breed, dog_weight, dog_bloodType, apply_status, email) VALUES(DOG_ID_APPLY_DOGIVER.nextval,#{dog_name},#{dog_age},#{dog_breed},#{dog_weight},#{dog_bloodType},'신청완료', #{memEmail})
mapper.select: select dog_name, dog_age, dog_weight, dog_breed, dog_image, blood_cc, description, donation_date, dog_id, dog_bloodtype from apply_dogiver join dogiver using(dog_id)
